post.author: Stevenkim
post.content:
Hi

There is a charity organization in Toronto, and they want to have

a Web site .

Their budget is very minimal, however, if anyone is interested in

1. Development (Web page , register domain etc)
2. Maintenance

please contact me at 'saewhankim@hanmail.net'.

Thank you in advance for your interest.

SK
post.title: Web page ..
